Interface ICommand

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface ICommand
    Represents a pawn command

      • handle

        boolean handle(ShurikenSender sender,
               java.lang.String[] args)
        Handle a command. If this is a subcommand, parameters after the subcommand will be adapted in args for you
        Parameters:
        sender - the volume sender (pre-tagged)
        args - the arguments after this command node
        Returns:
        return true to mark it as handled
